rows.label: qst502009_msg0001
rows.name: How is this machine supposed to work?

rows.label: qst502009_msg0002
rows.name:
I've seen a lot of salvaged machinery
in my time, but nothing quite like this.

rows.label: qst502009_msg0101
rows.name:
I suppose this thing might work
if it were fed a stable flow of
lightning energy...

rows.label: qst502009_msg0102
rows.name:
We'd need someone with an enormous
supply of lightning energy, and the
ability to control it very precisely.

rows.label: qst502009_msg0103
rows.name:
If you're going to try it out, be sure to
do it at night. It's dangerous during the
day with so many people around.
